subject: science
text_en: Classify these animals into mammals, birds and fish.
text_zh: 把这些动物分类成哺乳动物、鸟类和鱼类。

subject: science
text_en: Fungi are usually found in damp places.
text_zh: 真菌通常在潮湿的地方发现。

subject: science
text_en: Birds reproduce by laying eggs.
text_zh: 鸟类通过产卵繁殖。

subject: science
text_en: Fish are covered with scales and have gills to breathe.
text_zh: 鱼身上有鳞片，用鳃呼吸。

subject: science
text_en: Warm-blooded animals have a constant body temperature.
text_zh: 恒温动物体温保持恒定。

subject: science
text_en: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract.
text_zh: 同极相斥，异极相吸。

subject: science
text_en: Choose a suitable material for a raincoat.
text_zh: 为雨衣选择合适的材料。

subject: science
text_en: Arrange the stages of a butterfly life cycle in order.
text_zh: 把蝴蝶的生命周期阶段按顺序排列。

subject: science
text_en: Animals depend on one another to maintain the balance in nature.
text_zh: 动物相互依赖来维持自然平衡。

subject: science
text_en: Plants can be classified into flowering and non-flowering plants.
text_zh: 植物可分为开花植物与不开花植物。

subject: science
text_en: Match each plant part to its function.
text_zh: 把植物部位与其功能配对。

subject: science
text_en: Label the mouth, stomach and intestines on the digestive system diagram.
text_zh: 在消化系统图上标注口、胃和肠。

subject: science
text_en: Match each plant part to its function.
text_zh: 把植物部位与其功能配对。

subject: science
text_en: Identify whether the force is a push or a pull.
text_zh: 判断这个力是推还是拉。

subject: science
text_en: Give one characteristic of mammals.
text_zh: 写出 哺乳动物 的一个特征。

subject: science
text_en: Predict what will happen when two like poles are brought close together.
text_zh: 预测两个同极靠近时会发生什么。

subject: science
text_en: State one property of rubber that makes it suitable for a raincoat.
text_zh: 写出 rubber 适合做雨衣的一个性质。

subject: science
text_en: Predict what will happen when two like poles are brought close together.
text_zh: 预测两个同极靠近时会发生什么。
